statements: UPDATE SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections SET posts_count = 50, post_engagement = 200 WHERE election_id = 'c8114a3c-0394-4e39-b17c-22eea2d0703a';
UPDATE SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections SET influencer_name = 'John Doe', agency_id = 'fd7947e0-41be-4420-8192-9ba4f4384d1e' WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
UPDATE SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections SET post_engagement = 1000, posts_count = posts_count + 1 WHERE election_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND social_media_platform = 'Twitter'
UPDATE SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections SET influencer_name = 'John Doe', posts_count = posts_count - 2 WHERE agency_id = '987e6543-21b8-3d12-a654-421417644222'
UPDATE social_media_platform SET platform_type = 'Social Network' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE election_influencers SET posts_count = 150, followers_count = 50000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_platform SET platform_type = 'New Type' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE election_influencers SET followers_count = 50000, posts_count = 200 WHERE influencer_id = 3;
UPDATE socialmedia_influence SET influence_score=8.5 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE elections SET winning_party='Democratic' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE socialmedia_influence SET influence_score = 8.9 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE elections SET winning_party = 'Democratic' WHERE election_id = 456;
UPDATE government_agencies SET agency_name = 'Department of Justice' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_influence SET influence_score = 8.75 WHERE account_id = 2 AND election_id = 1;
UPDATE government_agencies SET agency_name = 'Department of Homeland Security' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET posts_count = 500, followers_count = 10000 WHERE account_id = 3;
UPDATE Government_Agencies SET agency_name = 'Department of Health', agency_type = 'Healthcare' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE Social_Media_Platforms SET platform_type = 'Social Network', platform_name = 'Facebook' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE Government_Agencies SET agency_name = 'Department of Defense', agency_type = 'Defense Department' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content', post_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE post_id = 101;
